team.title: Team

home.description: Dark Tide Studio is an independent video game development studio located in the Biobío region, Chile. We specialize in the development of video games and interactive software. Our focus is on fostering the growth of developers, artists, and players.

sotd.title: Sons of the Depths
sotd.description: Sons of the Depthss (SOTD) is a survival horror game set in a remote village near the arctic circle. The game is inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos.
